content.rendered:
eStatements

Go Green. Go eStatements!

Banking with Westamerica is now more convenient with eStatements, the safe, simple, and green way to view your statement and check images.

With eStatements you’ll eliminate your check and statement storage hassles! Once you sign up for eStatements up to 24 months of information will build and be available to you at the touch of a button. You’ll be able to view, save, or print checks sorted by number, amount, or date.

eStatements also help you protect your private information. You’ll no longer have statements or cancelled checks at risk in the mail. Your unique login ID and password ensure confidentiality.

To sign up, go to the eStatements login page by clicking here and then select sign up!

If you are a StarConnnect customer just log in to StarConnect Plus™ as usual, then click on eStatements.
